product_name: The North Face Defroster Hoodie Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Defroster Hoodie for men upgrades the classic fleece jacket to a whole new level with materials that dry quickly, pack small and fit snugly for optimal insulation. Pontetorto hard-face fleece creates a durable outer face with an interior that insulates and wicks moisture; a touch of stretch ensures comfort and complete mobility. Strategically located FlashDry(TM) panels allow moisture-prone areas to dry quickly so you stay comfortable as long as possible. Hood fits close to the head to ensure helmet compatibility and comfort; extended collar and chin guard provide extra warmth and coverage during bad weather. 2 zippered hand pockets sit high on the torso to accommodate a harness or pack. Raglan style sleeve with off-the-shoulder seaming minimizes chafing and irritation when wearing a pack. The North Face Defroster Hoodie is part of The North Face Summit Series(TM), apparel designed and tested for use in harsh environments.
